channel.title: Custom item
channel.description:
Kk, so. I made a custom sheild....Dragon Long sheild. Like a normal kitesheild, but longer and...red.
It goes into the weapon slot and makes me invisible...I went into my source and put it into the sheilds area but that did not help.
Here's the code in my class8.java
if(i == 17001) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14703; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14702;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14702;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Long Sheild";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "The largest sheild out there!".getBytes();//examin info }

item.title: Custom item
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Kk, so. I made a custom sheild…Dragon Long sheild. Like a normal kitesheild, but longer and…red.

It goes into the weapon slot and makes me invisible…I went into my source and put it into the sheilds area but that did not help.

Here’s the code in my class8.java

if(i == 17001) {
    class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
    class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option
    class8.anInt174 = 14703; //
    class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
    class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller
    class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
    class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
    class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right
    class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
    class8.anInt204 = 28;
    class8.anInt165 = 14702;//male wearing
    class8.anInt200 = 14702;//female wearing
    class8.anInt204 = 28;
    class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown
    class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves
    class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves
    class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
    class8.aString170 = "Dragon Long Sheild";//Name of the new item
    class8.aByteArray178 = "The largest sheild out there!".getBytes();//examin info
}

Read full topic
